rows.name: Let's get a souvenir for Mom!
If you're tired, please feel free to rest.

I might pay a visit to
Quattor Street later.

As long as we're in Acedia,
we'll be taken care of, right?
Welcome to Acedia.
Which one should I get...?

First things first.
Let's go to the Sanctum to pray.
The Sanctum isn't far now.
Hey there!
I'll try to remember that.
The choir's singing is truly sublime.

I want to join the choir, too,
when I'm older!
You can really get lost in the music...

Excuse me, mo.
Could you teach me how to pray, mo?

Now listen, children. Understanding this mathematical
formula is required for employment in the Holy See.
Let's all study hard today.
Let me just confirm tomorrow's schedule.

Nights in Acedia are so quiet.
It's very pleasant.

I think Gramps went to drink
some Odifa again.

I still have to say,
I'm opposed to the whole idea of Blades.
How long can this go on...?

I wonder how my friends 
in Gula are doing...
Every day is the same old thing...

*sigh*
It never gets any easier, does it?
What a huge cathedral, mo...

I'm keeping a close eye on
the refugees from up here.
You must be tired, mo.

I need to get my prep work
done during the night.
I wonder what today's rations will be.
No more Blades!
Down with Blades!

Ugh, I'm so hungry!
I want more to eat!
Stop misbehaving.
Yes... Sorry...
Whoopee!
What should we play today?
Is the Divine Beast ship here yet?

Taking in refugees is a huge burden...
I mean, it's a noble thing to do, but...

I will study hard and master
Acedian technology, mo!

Is there any chance the rations
could be increased?
I never thought we'd end up relying on Acedia...

It could use a little
more spice.

Mmm!
Sweet and mellow!

No food or drink is allowed inside the
Sanctum. Finish it out here.
I can't decide what to get...

That refugee from earlier was here
again today...
When can we go back to Gula?
Line up properly, you louts!
What I wouldn't give for a cold one...
I must remain vigilant...
All right, form an orderly line!

When I grow up,
I'm going to be a great soldier!
